item.title: Readme
item.description: Layout Index Powered by Laravel Mix, this site is built using Hugo to efficiently generate static html pages and webpack to handle assets. Local Environment Setup Install packages yarn install Install Hugo brew install hugo Development Mode yarn do Starts a hugo server at http://localhost:1313/ Generate Distrubtion Files yarn hugo File Structure Development files are stored in the Hugo theme, founders Assets Type Path JS Source .
